item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.dc:creator: Nora Jones
item.description: Welcome to our new blog, My Blog. We hope you enjoy reading what we have to say!

item.title: The Sharpe Ratio
item.description: In this post we present a classic finance use case using the PerformanceAnalytics, quantmod, and dygraphs packages. We'll demonstrate importing stock data, building a portfolio, and then calculating the Sharpe Ratio.

item.title: Mapping Earthquakes Over the Past 30 Days
item.dc:creator: Vitor Chagas
item.description: In this post we present a classic finance use case using the PerformanceAnalytics, quantmod, and dygraphs packages. We'll demonstrate importing stock data, building a portfolio, and then calculating the Sharpe Ratio.

item.title: Puppy Linux : How to create an ISO image from a CD
